title: Resilience
description: The ability to withstand and reduce the magnitude and/or duration of disruptive events.

sections.title: Definition by FERC in an NERC Report
sections.body_md: > FERC proposed to define resilience as the ability to withstand and reduce the magnitude and/or duration of disruptive events, which includes the capability to anticipate, absorb, adapt to, and/or rapidly recover from such an event.
